ComicInfo.Summary:
Average kid Mark Farley finds a dream dimension that he is able to enter and even control as his alter ego Creed, aided by the mysterious talking frog named C.J. An encounter with Skeeziks in the Dreamworld leaves Creed with an infection, and his condition continues to deteriorate. But what does this have to do with Marks mysterious past?
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/creed-1-use-your-delusion-part-1/4000-255420/
ComicInfo.Title: Use Your Delusion: Part 1
